title: The Everafter Wish
description: Armed with knowledge that could change everything for humankind, Elle must confront the king.But it's the Godmother who now poses the greatest threat. Can Elle and Dex stop her from taking control of the kingdom?~ ~ ~CITY OF WISHES is an urban fantasy serialized retelling of Cinderella. This is episode 6.~ ~ ~In a world of fae, vampires and shifters, where wishes can be bought and bargained for, Elle is human, bound to her stepmother by a slave charm. Her only hope at freedom is to wish for it. But the Godmother rules the illegal wish trade, and the price she demands is steep. Is Elle willing to pay it?
author: Rachel  Morgan
